SummaryEnglish: The story centers on Hiiro Ryuugasaki, a student at Tensei Academy. Through a strange incident, Hiiro obtains a mysterious smartphone. The smartphone has installed the popular digital card game "Shadowverse." Through the game Hiiro meets rivals, participates in tournaments, and forms bonds with others

1.SummaryEnglish: Look Back and Tell Story form EP01- EP12

2.SummaryEnglish: Before Hiro and his team save the world, let's look back at everything they've accomplished, from Hiro's very first game of Shadowverse to his victory against Leon!

3.SummaryEnglish: The Shadowverse battlers look back on their fight to save the world, and look forward to their future.

4.SummaryEnglish: In this special episode, Seventh Flame looks back on all the fun they've had playing Shadowverse!

5.SummaryEnglish: Shadowverse Flame is back! But before we see what happened to Light and the Gang, let's take a look back at the World Ranking and Club Tournament.

6.SummaryEnglish: Light and some of the gang are joined by Hiro, Luca, and a few familiar old faces as they take a look back at Seventh Flame's battles with the Seven Shadows in Genesis Corp's experimental facility, the Shadow Area.

7.SummaryEnglish: Mikado and Ryoga spend some quality time with their Digital Friends, while the girls talk about Seventh Flame's most powerful cards.

1.SummaryEnglish: Hiiro Ryugasaki, a boy who attends Tensei Gakuen. Hiro wanted to play the popular digital card game "Shadowverse", commonly known as Shadowverse , but his grandfather Shigefumi didn't buy a smartphone. One morning, Heero tries to go to school as usual and hears a mysterious voice calling himself. Guided by that voice, Heero enters the warehouse at home. A brand new smartphone was placed in the warehouse ...

2.SummaryEnglish: Heero meets Lucia Natsuki at night in the park at night when it's quiet. Heero thinks that Lucia also likes Shadowverse, and challenges Lucia to a battle. Lucia agrees with Heero's challenge. His eyes were sharply narrowed like a blade ...

3.TitleEnglish: The Plot of the Genius Among Geniuses
3.SummaryEnglish: Heero wins a series of battles in a battle at Tensei Gakuen. What appeared there was Heero's one-year junior, Ijuin Kai. After overwhelming Heero's friend Kazuki Shindo, Kai strikes Heero with a challenge. Can Heero beat Kai ...? "I'll show you the plot of the super genius."

4.SummaryEnglish: Hiiro's friend, Mimori Amamiya. Mimori has complex about her being so "normal". She idolizes Alice Kuroba, a nationwide idol. When she's absentmindedly looking at Alice's poster, a mysterious girl appears. The girl challenges her, saying "I'll take you to meet Alice Kuroba if you can win against me!"...

5.SummaryEnglish: As usual, Heero tries to battle at Shadowverse Stadium. Then, the large-scale vision at the entrance had the words "Today's store tournament! Looking for participants!"! Heero decides to participate while being excited about the first tournament. Then, Kazuki also comes late there. Always a friend, today a rival. The battle between the two is about to begin ...!

6.SummaryEnglish: Study, sports, and Shadowverse. Lucia Natsuki, a boy who has no chance at all. Lucia has the talent to envy everyone, but all he needs is strength, not an envy Lucia drives herself and lives stoicly. In front of him, a professional player, Seiya Fangkura, appears ...

7.SummaryEnglish: Heero aims for a master rank in order to participate in the national competition. Heero continued to win the battle, but he couldn't reach it one step further. At that time, a grandmaster-ranked man-Leon Orlanche appears in front of Heero. "If you beat me, you're a master rank." Heero's challenge begins with the title of Master Rank!

8.SummaryEnglish: Heero has decided to participate in the national tournament. What was waiting for us after the tough qualifying was the final tournament where only the strongest players gathered! A mysterious girl wearing a hood appeared as an opponent in the first round. What is her true identity as "Ecila"?

9.TitleEnglish: The Curtain Rises! A Beautiful Witch Show!
9.SummaryEnglish: Heero wins the first round and advances the piece to the second round. The opponent is Seiya Fangkura, a professional player! Saiya was soft-mannered, but a hot flame swirled behind her eyes. Can Heero win the "serious Seiya" that he didn't show in the battle with Lucia?

10.SummaryEnglish: The national tournament is finally over! Heero arrives at the semi-final and meets a mysterious boy, Maura. Maura plays a tricky card with a suspicious smile. One step closer to the final match with Lucia. A battle that can never be defeated begins!

11.SummaryEnglish: After a number of hot battles, the finals finally begin. Heero faces Lucia again to repay his former debt. The eyes of two people crossing each other, the feelings of two people colliding with each other. However, in the battle, the decisive difference between Heero and Lucia becomes clear. "Heero. For me, Shadowverse is--"

12.SummaryEnglish: Heero and Lucia, two people passing each other, two people who do not overlap. Still, believing in the connection of Shadowverse, Heero continues the battle with all his might. What Heero sees before the final is the end of the battle, or--.

13.SummaryEnglish: Waiting for Heero and his friends to participate in the national tournament was the new tournament "Shadow Grand Prix" by Genesis Company! Heero is thrilled by the presence of powerful players from all over the world. And now, the curtain of a new battle is about to rise.

14.SummaryEnglish: Heero first encountered the legendary cook, Tabeoka Maisel. Heero, who was challenged to a battle of disqualification if he lost, confronted Mysel with determination .... "Western food when standing, Japanese food when sitting, Italian when walking ... A chef who has mastered all kinds of dishes from ancient times to east and west! That's me!"

15.SummaryEnglish: Heero won the battle with Mysel. The next opponent was Miyabi, the daughter of the Zaizenji family. "Since the creation of the heavens and the earth, the common people have never beaten me!" Miyabi tosses Heero in a gorgeous battle that seems to be a super rich man. Can Heero defeat Miyabi ...?

16.TitleEnglish: An Invitation to the Underworld! The Joubert Sisters!
16.SummaryEnglish: While Heero is in a hot battle, Mimori meets Alice at that time. It was the infamous bounty hunter Justine sisters who appeared in front of the two who enjoyed a momentary conversation. Mimori and Alice, who were challenged by the Justine sisters in a "tag battle," throw themselves into an unbeatable battle. "Tell me, my sister." "Sister Justine is an invincible bounty hunter ..."

17.SummaryEnglish: Mimori who longs for specially. Alice who longs for ordinary. The two back-to-back are now facing each other face-to-face. "I don't know which one is right, but I don't know , so I'll do this." "... To understand Alice, this is ... I'm sure Shadowverse is the best." The eyes of the two who collide are hot and shining.

18.TitleEnglish: A Terrible Trap! Zuo and Ko
18.SummaryEnglish: Kai is steadily producing results. Kazuki who hasn't even battled yet. The two opposites meet again at Genesis Island. Waiting for a sneaky trap, hunting time. "Is there cowardice or shit in hunting!" "It's over."

19.SummaryEnglish: A tournament to decide the strongest Shadowverse player in the world. The winner will be given the position of president of Genesis Company. ...... That is the Shadow Grand Prix. But everything was just a deception. Now ... Leon Orlanche begins to move. "The Shadow Grand Prix is ​​finally here. Everyone, please encourage me ..."

20.SummaryEnglish: Heero defeated the mysterious player Shadow Knights. What appeared was Maura, the opponent who once fought in the national tournament. "Maura ... Are you also Shadow Knights ...!?" "Well ... how about?" "Well, at least ... it must be your enemy!"

21.SummaryEnglish: Heero heads for Leon's central tower to uncover the secrets of the Shadow Grand Prix. What is blocking that path is ... Lucia, the dark nobleman who pursues strength. "It's not the time to fight now!" "... What else? The Shadow Grand Prix isn't over yet." Eyes that intersect, feelings that do not intersect. The inevitable battle begins.

22.SummaryEnglish: The battle between the two accelerates as they collide with their unyielding feelings. "Lucia. It's coming this time. My heart is ... you!" "Heero, you 're strong, but you and I are too different ..." Now is the time to settle.

23.SummaryEnglish: Seven selected people gathered at the central tower. Heero, Lucia, Mimori, Kazuki, Kai, Alice, Maura ... The secret of the world revealed to them is the "Tree of Disaster". The existence of disaster that destroys everything. Heero and his friends take on the final battle to qualify to save the world.

24.SummaryEnglish: The eighth class finally revealed, the Nemesis class. Before that mighty power, Heero is forced to struggle. But ... Heero wasn't the only one to confront the Nemesis class. "A little ... let's talk about old times" The past of Ryugasaki Age unraveled. The greatest test for Heero continues.

25.SummaryEnglish: The time of the world has stopped due to the tree of calamity. The "imaginary shadow" that appears, the people who are obsessed and manipulated ... In the midst of the end of the visit, but still seven wills to shine. "Only seven people have been selected to save the world ... you guys!"

26.SummaryEnglish: Heero rescued Takuma, who was manipulated by the shadow of the imagination. Beyond numerous enemies, Heero finally reaches the ruins where the legendary card sleeps. Can Heero get the legendary card ......... The black cursed dragon warrior takes the price of Heero with his eyes.

27.SummaryEnglish: Using the power of the imaginary shadow, Shirou hunts down Heero. Now that he has the strength he wants, he should be able to beat Heero ………… Shiro thinks so, but he doesn't realize it. The strength of Shadowverse is the strength of the heart. The will to never give up is the most important thing. "Go, Shirou! I get the legend!"

28.SummaryEnglish: Kai and Alice arrive at the ruins of the legendary card. The ones waiting were the Justine sisters. Beautiful and terrifying bounty hunter. "The Justine sisters are invincible ..." "It's over, from the beginning!" Can Kai and Alice grab the legendary card beyond the raging battle of darkness?

29.SummaryEnglish: Lucia got the legendary card. And then, "the opponent you don't want to fight the most". "The Good Brother. It's always kind to me. So you don't even know that I'm suffering." The lies that have been piled up, the truth that has been hidden. The words of her beloved sister, Shiori, shake Lucia's heart.

30.SummaryEnglish: Mimori confronts the manipulated Seiya. Even in the face of that mighty power, Mimori never retreats. "This is the end of the play! Let's eat you up !" "Don't give up! Absolutely!" Mimori's determination awakens an old legend.

31.SummaryEnglish: "It's bad, it's 2 to 1. I wonder if I've become cowardly because I'm obsessed with this guy?" "Heffalump, that's from the front." Kazuki is forced into a disadvantageous battle against Heffalump and Kou. However, Kazuki never gives up. For what you want to protect, for the world to be saved.

32.SummaryEnglish: Maura Averardo, one of the seven chosen. His lonely fate surely undermined himself. The mask you wear is a lie mask, so the legendary card never shines. In the midst of turmoil and turmoil, Maura confronts Lucia. "What are you going to do? That's ... I don't even know."

33.SummaryEnglish: Due to the power of Ryugasaki Age, Maura is obsessed with a large amount of imaginary shadows. Hope slips through Maura's hands and disappears, whether stretched or stretched. At last Maura gave up ... accepted her destiny and became an "enemy of the world". But ... there are those who haven't given up yet. Heero and Lucia stand up for their "friends."

34.SummaryEnglish: Heero and Lucia struggle in front of the "three sacred treasures / cards" with Maura's despair. Overflowing grudges, repeated curse words, Maura is no longer Maura. …… Still, Maura for Heero is a “friend”. An irreplaceable "friend" connected by Shadowverse. "Maura! I will never give up! You and this world!"

35.SummaryEnglish: "It's been a long time, this place, this smell, this wind." It was a sudden reunion, an unexpected encounter. "No way, is it my father ...!?" Heero's words ... but never reach Age. It was a sudden reunion ... an unexpected disconnection.

36.SummaryEnglish: "Defeat. And see the destruction of the world with your own eyes." There is a vestige in its appearance, and its binocular is pathetic. Age is no longer the father of Heero ... but an enemy of the world. "Fate is no longer on your side" In a sad but fierce battle, the tree of calamity stands quietly ...

37.TitleEnglish: A Voice That Calls to Awaken
37.SummaryEnglish: Hiiro Ryugasaki, a boy who attends Tensei Gakuen. Hiro wanted to play the popular digital card game "Shadowverse", commonly known as Shadowverse , but his grandfather Shigefumi didn't buy a smartphone. Guided by the voice of his mother who calls his name, Heero returns to everyday life. ...... To eternal daily life.

38.TitleEnglish: Hiro and the Black Dragon Knight
38.SummaryEnglish: "Heero ... Battle with me" Heero confronts Lowen in a lost world. Why are you here and why did you meet? Because I don't know, I will battle. "Let's do it, Lowen!

39.SummaryEnglish: Mimori Amamiya, 14 years old. What I like is tea and what I don't like is scary. ...... What I am good at is singing! I who shine on the stage is a "special" me who is second to none. "I'm an idol!"

40.SummaryEnglish: Kurobane Alice. I like to live freely and I hate being tied up. ...... I always want to be myself. I'm a "normal" person with someone in the crowd. "Ah ♪ You may not be able to choose! Freedom is great!"

41.SummaryEnglish: "A large serving of meat miso fried rice, don't you wait!" In dreams, in ideals, in illusions. Still, Kazuki is no different from "always". …… So, no matter what kind of trial comes, just overcome it like “always”.

42.SummaryEnglish: If you solve the test, you will get a perfect score of 100 points. A wonderful book in a kendo class. If you have a battle, you will win a series of battles. Kai is a super genius, just perfect. ...... Probably that should be the case.

43.TitleEnglish: Mauro's Wish, a Longing that Cannot Be
43.SummaryEnglish: That is sin. A guilt that hurt a friend. That is punishment. Punishment for destroying the world. The encounter between the two sinners is inevitable.

44.SummaryEnglish: I knew, I knew, but I still wanted to dream. ...... Under the moonlight, a fleeting wish sways and trembles. "Today is the full moon, brother." "Ah ... it's as beautiful as a lie."

45.SummaryEnglish: The seven chosen ones seized the true hope. As a proof of that ... a huge castle appears in the sky. The stairs that extend are far and high. But they have nothing to fear anymore. ...... Finally, the real battle begins.

46.SummaryEnglish: Heero falls down after receiving the full power of Age. Now that the Infinite Flame Dragon has been destroyed, there is no way left for Heero ... "It's not over. I'm not losing ..." ...... Still, Heero stands up. Don't give up until the end ... that's his Shadowverse.

47.SummaryEnglish: The spell card "Shadow Mode" used by Leon ... brought great power. To evolve the world, Leon also evolves. "I'm your enemy, but for the world ... a savior." What dwells in Heero's chest is ... anger. Ferocious ... Feelings of violent anger. "You are ... because of you! You are defeated! Absolutely ... here!"

48.SummaryEnglish: The overlapping bonds turn into power, and finally the "Ultimate Legend Dragon" descends. With the thoughts of seven people, the ultimate legend roared. "I will never give up on any enemy! That's mine !" "Our!" "Shadowverse ah ah ah!"

1.SummaryEnglish: Light Tenryu is a new kid who's just come to the Shadowverse Battle College after a strange man told him he could "find his destiny" here. What fantastic adventures await him?

2.SummaryEnglish: The Seventh Flame Shadowverse club has to get more members if they want to survive. But everyone who wants to play Shadowverse has already joined a club, so where can they find new members? Light has a brilliant plan...

3.TitleEnglish: I Can Tell Because We Battled!
3.SummaryEnglish: Light wants Shinobu to join Seventh Flame, but she'll only listen to him if he can beat her first. The only problem is... he has no idea how to play Shadowverse!

4.SummaryEnglish: Light faces off against Gentleman, a strategic genius who uses the avatar of a magician's rabbit. Can he prevail against his foe's gigantic brain?

5.SummaryEnglish: Light's battle with Gentleman reaches its peak as he gets ready to summon his ultimate card. But what if his best card isn't his best move?

6.TitleEnglish: Courage Will Always Give You Strength!
6.SummaryEnglish: The gang meets Ren, a young girl with Fifth Sword. She likes running and working out, but feels left out when she's with the other girls in her club. Is there a better place for her to belong?

7.SummaryEnglish: Itsuki battles the head of Fifth Sword to allow Ren to join the team. Can the timid, shy Itsuki stand up to the most athletic Shadowverse player of them all?

8.SummaryEnglish: Subaru challenges Hahajima, the Club President of Fourth Wind. Hahajima gives it her all for the sake of her club members, but Subaru seems like he's not having fun...

9.SummaryEnglish: Subaru and Fuwari's battle reaches its last half. Can Subaru win? And does he even want to?

10.TitleEnglish: There's No Point in Getting Serious
10.SummaryEnglish: Tsubasa is cool, pretty, and liked by everyone. She spends her days doing karaoke and hanging out with her friends. Sure, her team was shut down by Haruma Hazeura. But what's the point of even trying, anyway?

11.SummaryEnglish: Light begins his battle with Tsubasa, the head of Third Feather. She's convinced that there's no hope left in Shadowverse. Can he prove her wrong?

12.SummaryEnglish: Light's battle with Tsubasa reaches its conclusion. Can Seventh Flame get the last team member they need to survive?

13.TitleEnglish: Only the Strong Survive in Shadowverse!
13.SummaryEnglish: Now that Seventh Flame has a full crew, Light decides to challenge Haruma. But Light is acting very strange...

14.SummaryEnglish: As Light faces Hazeura, he realizes quickly that he's gotten more than he bargained for. Will his luck hold out against the President of First Reaper?

15.TitleEnglish: Battle in a Way That's True to Yourself!
15.SummaryEnglish: Following his defeat to Hazeura, Light decides to buckle down and learn more about Shadowverse. His first opponent is none other than the legendary idol and Shadowverse player Alice Kurobane!

16.SummaryEnglish: Subaru saves Mimori from an overly-aggressive street proselytizer. As they get to know each other, they decide to play a game of Shadowverse.

17.TitleEnglish: I Want Shadowverse to Excite Me!
17.SummaryEnglish: Subaru continues his battle with Mimori. A miserable childhood left him cold to Shadowverse. Can she help him find the fire inside him once more?

18.TitleEnglish: My Rhythm Is the Heartbeat of a Devil!
18.SummaryEnglish: Itsuki challenges Ryoga, a powerful Bloodcraft player who hangs out by the riverside, and claims that his "rhythm is the heartbeat of a devil."

19.TitleEnglish: I Have My Own Ace in the Hole!
19.SummaryEnglish: Itsuki's battle continues against the demon of sound. Can he rise above the noise and win the day?

20.TitleEnglish: That's What Makes It So Fun!
20.SummaryEnglish: Ren wants to be friends with Tsubasa, but Tsubasa has other things on her mind. That's about to change though, when Ren challenges her to a game of Shadowverse!

21.TitleEnglish: If You Can't Surpass Me, There's No Point
21.SummaryEnglish: Ren challenges Tsubasa, the girl she admires so much. Can she win her respect, and her friendship?

22.SummaryEnglish: Ren and Tsubasa are hot on the trail of Gentleman, the most mysterious member of Seventh Flame. But when they find him, he's not at all what they expect!

23.SummaryEnglish: Tsubasa battles Gentleman, who's even tougher in real life than she is as a digital avatar!

24.SummaryEnglish: In search of a way to master Shadowverse before his battle with Haruma, Light challenges his own teacher. But he's shocked when he finds out what her rank is!

25.TitleEnglish: So This Is Your True Form?
25.SummaryEnglish: As he readies himself for a showdown with Haruma, Light must first defeat his own teacher to master the secrets of Shadowcraft.

26.SummaryEnglish: The Shadowverse Club Tournament begins as Gentleman challenges Shinobu in a duel to prove who's the real master of Runecraft at Shadowverse Battle College.

27.TitleEnglish: I'm Not Who I Used to Be!
27.SummaryEnglish: Gentleman finishes his duel with Miki, the girl he once thought he had under his thumb. Does she really hate him for the way he bossed her around?

28.SummaryEnglish: Tsubasa challenges her old club president, Seira, in a battle to see who's the true leader of Third Feather.

29.TitleEnglish: I'll Show You the Person I Want to Be!
29.SummaryEnglish: Ren challenges her old club president as Seventh Flame faces Fifth Sword!

30.SummaryEnglish: It's Subaru's turn to take the stage in the battle against Fourth Wind at the Shadowverse Club Tournament!

31.TitleEnglish: I'll Show You the Strength of a Flower that Blooms in the Fields!
31.SummaryEnglish: Itsuki fights Ryoga Jasei in a duel to see if Seventh Flame can advance to the final round of the Shadowverse Club Tournament.

32.SummaryEnglish: Light duels Haruma in the final battle of the Shadowverse club tournament. Can he win this time after failing before?

33.TitleEnglish: Now I'm Strong Enough to Reach You!
33.SummaryEnglish: The showdown with Haruma draws to a close as the Shadowverse Club Tournament reaches its end. Can Light truly come to understand his foe?

34.SummaryEnglish: It's a resort, everybody! With victory in hand, the members of Seventh Flame get ready for a relaxing day at a private island.

35.SummaryEnglish: There's more fun in the sun as Seventh Flame relaxes on Genesis Island!

36.TitleEnglish: To Me, It's All a Game!
36.SummaryEnglish: Light challenges Mikado, who plays a Neutral deck. Neutral cards are supposed to be the weakest type, but Mikado's might be stronger than it appears...

37.SummaryEnglish: The duel with Mikado continues as he unleashes a flurry of powerful Fallen Angels, and an unstoppable dragon.

38.SummaryEnglish: A shocking turn of events takes place as a new Shadowverse tournament begins.

39.TitleEnglish: This is the True Power of the Joubert Sisters!
39.SummaryEnglish: Light battles the elder of the two Joubert sisters and her tricky combo deck.

40.SummaryEnglish: Light challenges his first pro player, a tricky Earth Rite Runecraft user!

41.SummaryEnglish: Light challenges Mikado once more, this time with more powerful cards. Can he defeat the school's strongest player?

42.TitleEnglish: I'll Take This One Step With All My Might!
42.SummaryEnglish: Subaru fights his brother in a surprise bonus match!

43.TitleEnglish: Some Sights Can Only Be Seen Alone!
43.SummaryEnglish: Shion battles a powerful Grand Master who wants to teach her a lesson about being alone. But is that really what she needs to hear?

44.SummaryEnglish: Wolfram Zerga challenges dark horse Ryoga Jasei in an attempt to make him enter the World Ranking.

45.TitleEnglish: I've Got High Hopes For You
45.SummaryEnglish: Itsuki challenges the legendary player Luca Yonazuki, one of the Seven Shadows.

46.SummaryEnglish: Ren meets a fellow fan of the Battle Fencer TV show who has very different ideas about who the best character is.

47.TitleEnglish: Still, I'll Stay True to Myself!
47.SummaryEnglish: Ren continues her battle with Hina, as each of them seeks to prove whether heroes or villains are stronger.

48.TitleEnglish: That Dazzling Light Will Someday Fade
48.SummaryEnglish: Tsubasa talks about her dreams of going pro as she battles the grand master Andrea.

49.SummaryEnglish: Light challenges Mikado for the final time.

50.TitleEnglish: I've Finally Made It This Far!
50.SummaryEnglish: Light reaches the climactic showdown in his battle with Mikado.

51.SummaryEnglish: With Mikado defeated, Seventh Flame readies for their next big challenge: defeating the Seven Shadows.

52.SummaryEnglish: The gang begins their battles in the mysterious Shadow Area, with the promise that if they can defeat the Seven Shadows, all will be revealed.

53.SummaryEnglish: The first battle in the Shadow Area begins as Mikado faces off against Hiro and his secret Portalcraft deck.

54.TitleEnglish: I'll Make It a Defeat That Means Something!
54.SummaryEnglish: Hiro puts his plan into action. His goal: to help Mikado enjoy Shadowverse!

55.SummaryEnglish: Tsubasa challenges the secretive Shadowcraft member of the Seven Shadows, whose identity is a mystery.

56.TitleEnglish: Neither I, Nor the World, Will Change
56.SummaryEnglish: Tsubasa's battle with the Shadowcraft member of the Seven Shadows reaches its conclusion as she plays her most powerful cards and combos. Will it be enough to bring down the greatest Shadowcraft player in the world?

57.TitleEnglish: Destined to Disappear Before the Light
57.SummaryEnglish: Ryoga begins his battle against Wolfram. Can his superior rhythm defeat the master of equality?

58.TitleEnglish: I'm Taking You With Me to the Pits of Hell
58.SummaryEnglish: Ryoga continues his duel with Wolfram. Wolfram has declared that Ryoga is worthless and beyond salvation. Is he right?

59.TitleEnglish: If It's Too Sweet, It Gives You Heartburn
59.SummaryEnglish: It's Hero Swordcraft vs. Villain Forestcraft once more as Ren faces Hina, the latest of the Seven Shadows.

60.TitleEnglish: Drown in the Aesthetics of Evil!
60.SummaryEnglish: Ren's battle with the villainous Hina comes to an end, as both players show off an array of powerful new cards.

61.TitleEnglish: I've Decided I'm Not Running Anymore!
61.SummaryEnglish: After years of estrangement, Subaru goes to face his younger brother once more.

62.SummaryEnglish: Subaru reaches the conclusion of his battle with his younger brother. Can the brothers be reunited once more?

63.TitleEnglish: The Hour of Judgment is Nigh
63.SummaryEnglish: The mysterious Arc Ruler lurks in the shadows as Shion prepares to battle Wodin.

64.TitleEnglish: Penetrate Even the Most Forbidden Secrets
64.SummaryEnglish: Shion battles Wodin, the most solitary member of the Seven Shadows. Will she succumb to the temptation to walk the forbidden path alone, or stay with her friends in Seventh Flame?

65.TitleEnglish: The Forbidden is Nothing to Fear!
65.SummaryEnglish: Shion finishes her battle with Wodin Kraft. Will she make the choice he wants her to make, or will she find her own path to follow?

66.TitleEnglish: I'll Challenge You With All I've Got!
66.SummaryEnglish: Itsuki battles Luca, the legendary Bloodcraft player who fought to save the world. Luca's lost his interest in the game, and Itsuki hopes to reignite his passion.

67.SummaryEnglish: Itsuki has succeeded in reigniting Luca's passion. Can he withstand the full force of one of the greatest Shadowverse players ever to exist?

68.SummaryEnglish: With only one more loss before Seventh Flame is defeated, Itsuki decides to turn the battle over to a badly shaken Mikado.

69.TitleEnglish: You Will Learn the Meaning of Your Own Shadowverse
69.SummaryEnglish: Mikado is on the verge of losing to Luca, the legendary Bloodcraft player. Can he find the strength within to keep going?

70.TitleEnglish: I'll Strike You With the Light and Darkness Within Me!
70.SummaryEnglish: It's finally time for Light to battle Hiro. The battle with the greatest Shadowverse player is about to begin...

71.SummaryEnglish: The final battle against the Seven Shadows has begun, and the final opponent has a question for Hiro: "What is Shadowverse to you?"

72.TitleEnglish: Our Battle is Just Getting Started!
72.SummaryEnglish: Light's battle with Hiro, the strongest Shadowverse player, continues. Can Lævateinn Dragon match up to the power of the champ's best card?

73.TitleEnglish: I'll Put All My Feelings Into This Draw!
73.SummaryEnglish: The battle with the Seven Shadows comes to a conclusion just as a powerful new threat reveals itself...

74.SummaryEnglish: The DigiFriends have gone out of control and are attacking people, and the students of Shadowverse Battle College are trapped on campus. They'll have to work together if they want to survive the onslaught.

75.TitleEnglish: Let's Save the World With This Power
75.SummaryEnglish: With the countdown to Earth's destruction drawing closer, Shion has a plan to save the day and defeat Arc Ruler.

76.TitleEnglish: For the Sake of the World, I'll Defeat You!
76.SummaryEnglish: Nekome-cho is overrun by Shades, forcing Subaru and Itsuki to fight their way through as they make their way toward the Gaia Tower to shut down the energy signal emanating from it.

77.SummaryEnglish: Subaru and Itsuki face off against Arc Ruler Erde in a two-on-one battle. But who exactly is this guy? And why is he so certain of victory, claiming that he knows all about the pair?

78.SummaryEnglish: The stakes get even higher in the battle between Arc Ruler Erde and the combined team of Subaru and Itsuki when the duo from Seventh Flame learn that the price of failure is death.

79.TitleEnglish: Open a Path to the Future!
79.SummaryEnglish: The two-on-one battle resumes where it left off, but can Subaru and Itsuki turn the tables on Arc Ruler Erde with the help of their Digital Friends?

80.TitleEnglish: I'll Pay the World Back For What It's Done to Me!
80.SummaryEnglish: Hina and Andrea reveal themselves, and begin a team match against Tsubasa and Ren. Can Seventh Flame finally get through to their foes?

81.TitleEnglish: So This Is What You Call Anger
81.SummaryEnglish: The battle with Hina and Andrea comes to a conclusion as Ryoga and Mikado battle their next opponent.

82.TitleEnglish: This Is the Truth of Everything!
82.SummaryEnglish: Himmel battles Ryoga and Mikado. She hopes to rattle them by revealing a horrible secret that belongs to Arc Ruler...

83.SummaryEnglish: Another of the Seven Shadows turns traitor, and there's no one left to stop them but Shion herself.

84.TitleEnglish: I'll Stop Your Unstoppable Desires Here!
84.SummaryEnglish: Shion battles Wodin Kraft, who now has the power of a god.

85.TitleEnglish: Still, It's Our Fate to Win!
85.SummaryEnglish: Wodin Kraft, now with godlike power, attempts to finish off Shion.

86.TitleEnglish: You're in the Palm Of Our Hand
86.SummaryEnglish: The climactic duel with Arc Ruler begins to determine the fate fo the world.

87.TitleEnglish: You Have No Way to Stop Your Destruction!
87.SummaryEnglish: The Nexa system was installed for the other players as well, improving the combat situation against the Shades.

88.SummaryEnglish: Arc Ruler believes his victory over Light is assured. Can Light beat the odds once more and turn the tide of the battle?

89.SummaryEnglish: Light and the Arc Ruler are finishing their battle. However, just as the duel comes to an end, Wolfram Zerga appears and confronts Light with an unbelievable matter...

90.SummaryEnglish: Wolfram Zerga's past, and plans, are revealed.

91.TitleEnglish: Destruction is All That Awaits You
91.SummaryEnglish: Wolfram questions what drives Light forward.

92.SummaryEnglish: The battle to decide the fate of the world comes to a shocking conclusion.

93.TitleEnglish: There's No Chance You Can Win
93.SummaryEnglish: Light gets a second chance to battle Wolfram.

94.SummaryEnglish: Draconir joins the fight with a powerful new form.

95.SummaryEnglish: Light's battle with Wolfram nears its end.

96.TitleEnglish: This is the Proof of Our Courage!
96.SummaryEnglish: With the fate of the world in the balance, Light plays his final card against Wolfram.

97.TitleEnglish: We're Having a Celebration Party, So Drop By!
97.SummaryEnglish: With the world saved, it's time for a big party. Let's all make takoyaki!

98.SummaryEnglish: The battle to save the world is over, but everyone's Shadowverse is just beginning!
